title: Fast Ferry... Dead?
body: <p>According to <a href="http://travis.servebeer.com/blog.net/archive/2004/06/09/CATS_vs_Austal_feat_Mayor_Johnson_plus_ALL_YOUR_BASE.aspx" title="CATS: You are on the way to destructionMayor Johnson: What you say?CATS: You have no chance to survive make your timeCATS: Ha ha ha.Austal: Captain!!Mayor Johnson: Take off every 'Fast Ferry'!!Mayor Johnson: Move 'Fast Ferry'.Mayor Johnson: For great profit.">CATS, it was on the way to destruction, it had no chance to survive, and it has already made its time</a>.  But is <a href="http://msnbc.msn.com/id/5937319/" title="Fast Ferry service stopped indefinitely">this for great justice</a>?</p>
